description.english: Make enough score to get an Extraball
description.german: Mache genug Punkte um einen Extraball zu bekommen
description.french: Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire !
description.italian: Accumula punti a sufficienza per ottenere una palla supplementare!
description.spanish: ¡Acumula puntos suficientes para ganar una bola extra!

description.english: Reach the first place of the Highscore list
description.german: Erreiche den ersten Platz im Highscore
description.french: Atteins le meilleur score !
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio più alto!

description.english: Win all Missions on 'Time To Fight Back' table
description.german: Gewinne alle Missionen. (TTFB)
description.french: Gagne toutes les missions ! (TTFB)
description.italian: Compi tutte le missioni!  (TTFB)

description.english: Win the 'secret' Extraball on 'Time To Fight Back' table
description.german: Gewinne den Extraball im 'Secret'. (TTFB)
description.french: Gagne la balle supplémentaire dans le Secret ! (TTFB)
description.italian: Ottieni la palla supplementare nel Segreto!  (TTFB)
description.spanish: ¡Gana la bola extra en el Secreto!  (TTFB)

description.english: Get the ramp Extraball in the centerhole (TTFB)
description.german: Hole den Extraball im mittleren Loch. (TTFB)
description.french: Cherche la balle supplémentaire dans le trou central ! (TTFB)
description.italian: Raccogli la palla supplementare nel foro centrale!  (TTFB)
description.spanish: ¡Recoge la bola extra en el hoyo del centro!  (TTFB)

description.english: Make enough score to get an Extraball
description.german: Mache genug Punkte um einen Extraball zu bekommen
description.french: Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire !
description.italian: Accumula punti a sufficienza per ottenere una palla supplementare!
description.spanish: ¡Acumula puntos suficientes para ganar una bola extra!

description.english: Reach the first place of the Highscore list
description.german: Erreiche den ersten Platz im Highscore
description.french: Atteins le meilleur score !
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio più alto!

description.english: Activate CARNIVAL
description.german: Schalte CARNIVAL frei
description.french: Active CARNIVAL !
description.italian: Attiva CARNIVAL!

description.english: Hit 30 ducks within one game
description.german: Treffe innerhalb eines Spiels 30 Enten am Schießstand. (Carnival)
description.french: Touche 30 canards dans le stand de tir au sein d’un jeu ! (Carnival)
description.italian: Colpisci 30 anatre nella baracca del tiro a segno entro un gioco!  (Carnival)
description.spanish: ¡Dispara 30 patos en la galería de tiro dentro de un juego!  (Carnival)

description.english: Make a series of 5 ramps . (Carnival) Get the bonus each time!
description.german: Schaffe 5 Rampen direkt hintereinander. Bonus muss jedes Mal geholt werden. (Carnival)
description.french: Réussis 5 rampes de suite ! Il faut que gagner le bonus chaque fois.","20":"Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire ! (Carnival)
description.italian: Supera 5 rampe di seguito! Bisogna di raccogliere il bonus ogni volta.  (Carnival)
description.spanish: ¡Consigue 5 rampas sucesivas! El bono tiene que ser recogido cada vez.  (Carnival)

description.english: Make enough score to get an Extraball
description.german: Mache genug Punkte um einen Extraball zu bekommen
description.french: Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire !
description.italian: Accumula punti a sufficienza per ottenere una palla supplementare!
description.spanish: ¡Acumula puntos suficientes para ganar una bola extra!

description.english: Reach the first place of the Highscore list
description.german: Erreiche den ersten Platz im Highscore
description.french: Atteins le meilleur score ! (Garden)
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio più alto!  (Garden)

description.english: Overcome 'Bug Attack' and get the flower bouquet. (Garden)
description.german: Überstehe 'Bug Attack' und hole den Blumenstrauß. (Garden)
description.french: Survis la ‘Bug Attack’ et cherche le bouquet de fleurs ! (Garden)
description.italian: Resisti il ‘Bug Attack’ e raccogli il mazzo di fiori!  (Garden)
description.spanish: ¡Resiste el ‘Bug Attack’ y recoge el ramo de flores!  (Garden)

description.english: Chase away 20 bugs within one game. (Garden)
description.german: Verjage innerhalb eines Spiels 20 Käfer. (Garden)
description.french: Chasse 20 insectes au sein d’un jeu ! (Garden)
description.italian: Scaccia 20 insetti entro un gioco!  (Garden)

description.english: Win 1,000,000 in the Mystery cave. (Garden)
description.german: Gewinne 1.000.000 in der Mystery Höhle. (Garden)
description.french: Gagne 1.000.000 dans la caverne ‘Mystery’ !
description.italian: Ottieni 1.000.000 nella caverna ‘Mystery’!

description.english: Make enough score to get an Extraball
description.german: Mache genug Punkte um einen Extraball zu bekommen
description.french: Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire !
description.italian: Accumula punti a sufficienza per ottenere una palla supplementare!
description.spanish: ¡Acumula puntos suficientes para ganar una bola extra!

description.english: Reach the first place of the Highscore list.  (Sheriff)
description.german: Erreiche den ersten Platz im Highscore. (Sheriff)
description.french: Atteins le meilleur score ! (Sheriff)
description.italian: Ottieni il punteggio più alto! (Sheriff)

description.english: Beat the gangster at the showdown. (Sheriff)
description.german: Besiege den Gauner beim Showdown. (Sheriff)
description.french: Vaincs le gangster dans l’épreuve de force finale ! (Sheriff)
description.italian: Betti il gangster nel combattimento finale!  (Sheriff)
description.spanish: ¡Bate al gánster en el enfrentamiento final!  (Sheriff)

description.english: Drink 20 beers within one game at the saloon. (Sheriff)
description.german: Trinke innerhalb eines Spiels 20 Biere im Saloon. (Sheriff)
description.french: Bois 20 bières dans le «Saloon» au sein d’un jeu ! (Sheriff)
description.italian: Bevi 20 birre nel “Saloon” entro un gioco!  (Sheriff)
description.spanish: ¡Bebe 20 cervezas en el “Saloon” dentro de un juego!  (Sheriff)

description.english: Get the Quarter Million behind the multiply targets. (Sheriff)
description.german: Hole die viertel Million hinter den Multiplikatorzielen. (Sheriff)
description.french: Cherche le quart de million ! (Sheriff)
description.italian: Raccogli il quarto di milione!  (Sheriff)

description.english: Make enough score to get an Extraball
description.german: Mache genug Punkte um einen Extraball zu bekommen
description.french: Obtiens un nombre suffisant de points pour gagner une balle supplémentaire !
description.italian: Accumula punti a sufficienza per ottenere una palla supplementare!
description.spanish: ¡Acumula puntos suficientes para ganar una bola extra!

description.english: Scare all persons and maximize the fright. (Ghosthouse)
description.german: Erschrecke alle Personen und erzeuge maximale Angst. (Ghosthouse)
description.french: Intimide toutes les personnes et maximise la peur ! (Ghosthouse)
description.italian: Spaventa tutte le persone e massimizza la paura!  (Ghosthouse)
description.spanish: ¡Asusta a todas las personas y maximiza el miedo!  (Ghosthouse)

description.english: Hit all SPOOK Targets at a Multiball.  (Ghosthouse)
description.german: Treffe alle Spookziele wärend eines Multiballs.  (Ghosthouse)
description.french: Atteins toutes les cibles de SPOOK avec une balle multiple ! (Ghosthouse)
description.italian: Colpisci tutti i bersagli di SPOOK con una palla multipla!  (Ghosthouse)
description.spanish: ¡Toca todos los puntos de destino de SPOOK con una Multibola!  (Ghosthouse)

description.english: Get 3 Extraballs within one game.  (Ghosthouse)
description.german: Hole 3 Extrabälle wärend eines Spiels.  (Ghosthouse)
description.french: Gagne 3 balles supplémentaires dans un jeu ! (Ghosthouse)
description.italian: Ottieni 3 palle aggiuntive in un gioco!  (Ghosthouse)

description.italian: Trova tutti i tesori e completa il labirinto intero! (Labyrinth)

description.german: Finde den Weg durch den erste Level. (Labyrinth)

description.french: Trouve un trésor !  (Labyrinth)

description.french: Gagne toutes les missions pour restaurer la ligne du temps !  (Time Flight)
description.italian: Compi tutte le missioni per ripristinare la linea del tempo! (Time Flight)
description.spanish: ¡Gana todas las misiones para restaurar la línea del tiempo!  (Time Flight)

description.english: Defeat the Zeppelin!  (Time Flight)
description.german: Bezwinge den Zeppelin. (Time Flight)
description.french: Vaincs le zeppelin ! (Time Flight)
description.italian: Betti lo zeppelin! (Time Flight)

description.french: Gagne une Multiball de 5 balles ! (Time Flight)

description.english: Complete all missions. (Ghouls)
description.german: Beende alle Missionen. (Ghouls)
description.french: Finis toutes les missions ! (Ghouls)
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni!  (Ghouls)

displayName.english: I could do this all day.
displayName.german: Das könnte ich den ganzen Tag tun.
displayName.french: Ça je pourrais faire toute la journée.
displayName.italian: Potrei continuare così tutto il giorno.

description.english: Complete 7 rounds in the cellar in a row! (Ghouls)
description.german: Schaffe 7 aufeinanderfolgende Runden im Keller. (Ghouls).
description.french: Finis 7 tours consécutives dans la cave !  (Ghouls)
description.italian: Completa 7 gironi consecutivi nel sotterraneo!  (Ghouls)

description.english: Win the Dance Mission. (Ghouls)
description.german: Starte und beende die Dance Mission. (Ghouls)
description.french: Commence et finis la « dance » mission ! (Ghouls)
description.italian: Comincia e completa la missione “Dance”! (Ghouls)
